FBS_RESBUT (ENUM)
FBS_RESBUT (ENUM)
Â¶
TYPE FBS_RESBUT :
Definition of SF_ResetButton function block states and its diagnostic values.
Attributes:
qualified_only
InOut:
Name
Initial
Comment
IDLE
16#0
The function block is not active (initial state).
WAIT_R_TRIG
16#83E2
The function block is enabled. Wait for R_TRIG at ResetIn.
WAIT_F_TRIG
16#83F2
ResetIn is TRUE. Wait for F_TRIG at ResetIn.
RESET_DETECTED
16#8000
Valid reset behavior was detected. The state is valid for at
least one cycle and will automatically transfer to 16#83E2.
ERR_PARAM
16#C000
TrailingMinimum > TrailingMaximum OR TrailingMinimum < 100
msec
ERR_RESET
16#C001
ResetIn is TRUE while waiting for NOT ResetIn.
ERR_TRAIL_MAX
16#C3E0
TrailingMaximum elapsed before detecting F_TRIG at ResetIn.
Waiting for R_TRIG at ResetIn.
ERR_TRAIL_MIN
16#C3F0
F_TRIG at ResetIn detected before TrailingMinimum elapsed.
Waiting for R_TRIG at ResetIn.

rows.Name: IDLE
rows.Comment: The function block is not active (initial state).

rows.Name: WAIT_R_TRIG
rows.Comment: The function block is enabled. Wait for R_TRIG at ResetIn.

rows.Name: WAIT_F_TRIG
rows.Comment: ResetIn is TRUE. Wait for F_TRIG at ResetIn.

rows.Name: RESET_DETECTED
rows.Comment:
Valid reset behavior was detected. The state is valid for at
least one cycle and will automatically transfer to 16#83E2.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET
rows.Comment: ResetIn is TRUE while waiting for NOT ResetIn.

rows.Name: ERR_TRAIL_MAX
rows.Comment:
TrailingMaximum elapsed before detecting F_TRIG at ResetIn.
Waiting for R_TRIG at ResetIn.

rows.Name: ERR_TRAIL_MIN
rows.Comment:
F_TRIG at ResetIn detected before TrailingMinimum elapsed.
Waiting for R_TRIG at ResetIn.
